Find this game in:
Cooking Games » Food Serving
Simulation » Restaurant Games
About Burger Restaurant:
Make milkshakes, hamburgers, French fries and get your restaurant to the top! There are 3 different restaurants.
How to play Burger Restaurant:
Prepare the orders by clicking with the left mouse button on the machines and ingredients. Tips: 1. Made a mistake? Click on the trashcan to throw it away. 2. You can put unfinished orders on the silver plates. In the meantime you can prepare something else.
Follow @Girlsgogames Embed:
